mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GALLERY.ARTIST (A_NO, A_NAME, A_SOLO, A_SQUARD, A_CAREER, A_STATE) VALUES(#{a_no}, #{a_name}, #{a_solo}, #{a_squard}, #{a_career}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT A_NO, A_NAME, A_SOLO, A_SQUARD, A_CAREER, A_STATE FROM GALLERY.ARTIST WHERE A_STATE=#{a_state} ORDER BY A_NO DESC
SELECT A_NO, A_NAME, A_SOLO, A_SQUARD, A_CAREER, A_STATE FROM GALLERY.ARTIST ORDER BY A_NO DESC
SELECT a.A_NO, a.A_NAME, a.A_SOLO, a.A_SQUARD, a.A_CAREER, a.A_STATE, e.E_IMG FROM ARTIST a INNER JOIN EXHIBITION e on a.A_NO = e.A_NO AND a.A_STATE=2
SELECT a.A_NO, a.A_NAME, a.A_SOLO, a.A_SQUARD, a.A_CAREER, a.A_STATE, m.M_ID FROM GALLERY.ARTIST a INNER JOIN GALLERY.MEMBER m ON a.A_NO = m.M_NO AND a.A_NO=#{a_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE GALLERY.ARTIST SET A_STATE= CASE WHEN A_STATE='1' THEN '2' WHEN A_STATE='2' THEN '2' ELSE 'DEFAULT' END WHERE A_NO=#{a_no}
